#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	char chch;
	cin.get(chch);
	while(t--)
	{
		char s1[10020],s2[10020];
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		int a[26]={0};
		for(int i=0;i<strlen(s1);i++)
		{
			a[s1[i]-'A']++;
		}
		for(int i=0;i<strlen(s2);i++)
		{
			a[s2[i]-'A']--;
		}
		int count = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
		if(a[i]!=0)
		{count = 1;break;}
		
		if(count)
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
